name: Live Music Performance
description: The Live Music Performance is the highlight of our festival, an experience that transcends time and space.

name: Food and Beverage Stalls
description: Indulge in a wide variety of delicious food and beverages from local and international vendors.

name: VIP Access Pass
description: Upgrade your festival experience with VIP access, exclusive seating, and amenities.

name: Merchandise Shop
description: Grab your favorite artist's merchandise, including t-shirts, posters, and more.

name: Artist Meet and Greet
description: Meet your favorite artists up close and personal. Limited slots available.

name: Camping Zone
description: Camp on-site and enjoy the full festival experience. Limited spots available.
